DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this survey was to understand the safety and efficacy of PAXIL tablets ("PAXIL", hereinafter) when it was started at 20 mg/day in subjects with depression or in a depressed state.
DOC.brief_title: Special Drug Use Investigation for PAXIL Tablet (Investigation in Case of Administered From 20mg/Day)
DOC.criteria: Patients with depression or in a depressed state Patients who start taking paroxetine at 20mg a day Patients who have been treated with paroxetine prior to this investigation Patients with hypersensitivity to paroxetine Patients taking monoamine oxidase inhibitors (MAOIs) or within 2 weeks of stopping treatment with MAOIs Concomitant use in patients taking pimozide
